body:
I'm bored beyond comprehension because school is back in session so yeah...

I'll do a thoughts on you thing or whatever but you gotta ask me a good question first.

title: Thoughts on you? AMA

replies.body:
You're Jackson, and you're hot. What else needs to be said? Not a veteran and not a noobie in my chat, you're just a normal user.

I'd fix block lag, focus on getting more players, and making the ranks actually worth.

Community division is something that would need to be fixed to have a properly running community. It's not really right. It's like a squad of friends who aren't friends with eachother.
